## Load Libraries

```{r}
#| message: false  

library(tidyverse) 
library(broom)  
library(cowplot)
```

## Load Data

```{r}
biopsy <- read_csv(
  "https://wilkelab.org/classes/SDS348/data_sets/biopsy.csv",
  show_col_types = FALSE)
```

## PCA

```{r}
pca_fit <- biopsy %>% 
  select(where(is.numeric)) %>% 
  scale() %>% 
  prcomp() 
```

## Visualization

```{r}
pca_fit %>% 
  augment(biopsy) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(
    x = .fittedPC1, 
    y = .fittedPC2,
    color = outcome)) +
  geom_point(
    alpha = 0.7, 
    size = 1.0) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(axis.line = element_line())
  
  
```
